name: Cacaca
description:
You can not play this game because then the other games would be upset.

Dedicated to Alessio and Eskarol (secretly Caca) who not only introduced me to Alessandra Amoroso's beautiful world, but made a little audition too as a way of demonstrating the joy and positivity coming from Alessandra:)

Credits:

  • Waiting Music by Lesfm from Pixabay
  • The One and Only Soundtrack: IL SOLE CACA DALLA FINESTRA 
  • Death Sound: Immobile 10+1
